talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: Get right in to the temple behind me.

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: There's an ancient ruin which is full of precious treasures.

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: But I think you guys will probably make it.

talkDataSet.name: Swordman
talkDataSet.dialogue: Okay.. Okay… I will take it.
